dict.string: Mimi bought 5 bunches of bananas. There were 3 bananas in each bunch. How many bananas did Mimi buy?
Ben planted 12 rows of rose bushes in his garden. He planted 6 bushes in each row. How many rose bushes did Ben plant in the garden?
There are 8 boxes of books in the storeroom. Each box has 4 books. How many books are there in all?
There are 4 people on each relay race team. Each person runs 4 laps. How many laps long is the relay race?
There are 5 boxed of cookies in the pantry. Each box contains 8 cookies. How many cookies are there in total?
Eli filled 9 vases with tulips. He put 4 tulips in each vase. How many tulips did Eli use?
A baseball stadium has 4 sections. There are 114 seats in each section. How many seats are there in all?
Each correct answer on a game show is worth 3 points. Last night, a contestant answered 219 questions correctly. How many points did the contestant earn?
A school is selling cookies as a fundraiser. Each box contains 5 cookies. Each student can sell 4 boxes of cookies. How many cookies can 3 students sell?

Darren is ordering breakfast in a restaurant. He can have hard boiled or scrambled eggs. On the side, he can choose to have hash browns, a muffin, or potatoes. How many different combinations can Darren order for breakfast?
